doc:
Catherine Allégret https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catherine_All%C3%A9gret 0 Catherine Allégret (born 16 April 1946) is a French actress. She is the daughter of Simone Signoret and Yves Allégret.In 2004, she published a book titled World Upside Down (Un monde à l'envers) in which she contended that she had been sexually abused by her stepfather Yves Montand since the age of 5.In 2007, she portrayed Édith Piaf's grandmother Louise Gassion in Olivier Dahan's biopic La Vie En Rose (La Môme in French). Catherine_Allégret ( born_16_April_1946 ) is a_French_actress . She is the_daughter of Simone_Signoret and Yves_Allégret.In_2004 , she published a_book titled World_Upside_Down_(_Un_monde_à_l'envers ) in which she contended that she had_been_sexually_abused by her_stepfather_Yves_Montand since the_age of 5 . In 2007 , she portrayed Édith_Piaf 's_grandmother_Louise_Gassion in Olivier_Dahan 's_biopic_La_Vie_En_Rose_(_La_Môme in French_) .
